en-US
motion picture (visual works) dvd 1 dvd disc (103 min.) Paul Morrissey's moralistic take on modern values. In Blood for Dracula, the infamous count searches Italy for virgin blood. Director's cut in a widescreen transfer. Special features include: audio commentary by Paul Morrissey, star Udo Kier, and film historian Maurice Yacowar; stills gallery of publicity and production photos, featuring excerpts from the Claudio Gizzi score in stereo.
Dracula Stoker, Bram, 1847-1912 1897
